医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
COVID-19：大流行的第二年，过量死亡人数从城市转移到农村地区波士顿大学公共卫生学院 (BUSPH) 和波士顿大学领导的一项新研究显示，在 COVID-19 大流行的第一年和第二年之间，美国大城市县的超额死亡人数减少，而农村县的超额死亡人数增加。宾夕法尼亚州（宾夕法尼亚大学）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230623/COVID-19-Excess-deaths-shifted-from-cities-to-rural-areas-in-second-year-of-pandemic.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230623/COVID-19-Excess-deaths-shifted-from-cities-to-rural-areas-in-second-year-of-pandemic.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e55b0810-7560-45c2-8552-b17fb627eef2 Fri, 23 Jun 2023 21:20:37 -0400 COVID-19: Excess deaths shifted from cities to rural areas in second year of pandemic
新药可以减缓抗生素耐药性贝勒医学院的一组研究人员在寻找全球细菌抗生素耐药性问题的解决方案方面取得了进展，该问题导致 2019 年近 130 万人死亡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230623/New-drug-could-slow-down-antibiotic-resistance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230623/New-drug-could-slow-down-antibiotic-resistance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=17e3620b-4c1d-4158-8f02-0dc0bd8eccb9 Fri, 23 Jun 2023 21:11:25 -0400 New drug could slow down antibiotic resistance
科学家发现了针对腹泻疾病建立持久免疫力的新方法在全世界范围内，每年有超过一百万人死于导致脱水和营养不良的腹泻病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230623/Scientists-discover-new-way-to-create- permanent-immunity-against-diarreal-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230623/Scientists-discover-new-way-to-create- permanent-immunity-against-diarreal-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=948bb775-d6e7-4fa4-be22-9aacfa1ee6c9 Fri, 23 Jun 2023 21:04:44 -0400 Scientists discover new way to create lasting immunity against diarrheal diseases
新模式有助于加快大流行期间的疫苗分发威尔康奈尔医学院、康奈尔大学伊萨卡校区、新加坡科技设计大学和加利福尼亚州圣何塞州立大学的研究人员开发了一种在大流行期间优化疫苗分配的模型，该模型使用了衡量此类努力成功与否的新衡量标准。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230623/New-model-could-help-speed-up-vaccine-distribution-during-pandemics.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230623/New-model-could-help-speed-up-vaccine-distribution-during-pandemics.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d73c4210-82a3-4737-99d8-20545850ad0c Fri, 23 Jun 2023 20:54:16 -0400 New model could help speed up vaccine distribution during pandemics
卵巢癌的 3D 模型揭示细胞位置如何影响肿瘤生物学利用卵巢癌肿瘤的 3D 模型，科学家发现了基于细胞在肿瘤中位置的基因活性差异，证明了癌性肿瘤中细胞的位置和环境如何强烈影响哪些基因是活跃的以及细胞在肿瘤中的作用。癌症的生物学。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230623/3D-models-of-ovarian-cancer-reveal-how-celle28099s-location-can-affect-tumor-biology.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230623/3D-models-of-ovarian-cancer-reveal-how-celle28099s-location-can-affect-tumor-biology.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2bda7edd-0bb3-47c6-8818-901aaf9c57a4 Fri, 23 Jun 2023 20:26:04 -0400 3D models of ovarian cancer reveal how cell’s location can affect tumor biology
研究表明，根据头部撞击的累积力量，足球运动员面临 CTE 风险多年来，研究慢性创伤性脑病（CTE）的研究人员认为，其主要原因是头部反复受到撞击，无论这些撞击是否引起脑震荡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230623/Football-players-at-risk-for-CTE-based-on-cumulative-force-of-head-hits-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230623/Football-players-at-risk-for-CTE-based-on-cumulative-force-of-head-hits-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b17336ae-6c91-42fd-a539-ea94f0100780 Fri, 23 Jun 2023 20:19:42 -0400 Football players at risk for CTE based on cumulative force of head hits, study shows
研究显示美国各州在治疗阿片类药物使用障碍方面存在巨大差异尽管非法芬太尼激增加剧了全国阿片类药物过量流行，但俄勒冈健康与科学大学的最新研究显示，美国各州在有效治疗医疗补助覆盖人群中阿片类药物使用障碍方面存在巨大差异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230623/Study-reveals-wide-discrepancies-among-US-states-in-treating-opioid-use-disorder.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230623/Study-reveals-wide-discrepancies-among-US-states-in-treating-opioid-use-disorder.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=51820490-41d9-414b-bfd7-d74da29a0f75 Fri, 23 Jun 2023 20:11:43 -0400 Study reveals wide discrepancies among U.S. states in treating opioid use disorder
AHA 拨款 2000 万美元用于解决农村社区的健康挑战根据《2020 年行动呼吁：农村健康：A》中报告的数据，居住在美国农村地区的人比居住在城市地区的人患心脏病的可能性高出 40%，中风的风险高出 30%美国心脏协会和美国中风协会的总统建议。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230623/AHA-awards-2420-million-to-address-health-challenges-in-rural-communities.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230623/AHA-awards-2420-million-to-address-health-challenges-in-rural-communities.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=97c6de3a-942e-4372-9b61-27414f7e534f Fri, 23 Jun 2023 20:06:38 -0400 AHA awards $20 million to address health challenges in rural communities
使用超市手推车检测严重的心脏病购物之旅可能会拯救你的生命：超市手推车可以帮助诊断心房颤动，然后可以对其进行治疗，以预防致残或致命的中风。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230623/Using-supermarket-trolleys-to-detect-a-serious-heart-condition.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230623/Using-supermarket-trolleys-to-detect-a-serious-heart-condition.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=07d3b2d1-10f8-41a6-81b9-e564b3958392 Fri, 23 Jun 2023 20:01:39 -0400 Using supermarket trolleys to detect a serious heart condition
鹰嘴豆的秘密历史：贸易路线和迁徙如何塑造豆类的遗传遗产凭借其坚果风味和丰富的营养成分，不起眼的鹰嘴豆几千年来一直吸引着味蕾并滋养着文明。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230623/Chickpeas-secret-history-How-trade-routes-and-migrations-shape-the-legumes-genic-heritage.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230623/Chickpeas-secret-history-How-trade-routes-and-migrations-shape-the-legumes-genic-heritage.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=79f4dea1-0ded-4685-a66d-9acc2b28f4a4 Fri, 23 Jun 2023 19:55:06 -0400 Chickpea's secret history: How trade routes and migrations shaped the legume's genetic heritage
